name: Lando Calrissian, Scoundrel (V)
Lore: 'With a silvery tongue or a rapid-fire blaster, Lando prides himself on being able to get out of tight situations. Is at his best when cornered.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Once per game, may convert opponent''s Lando present at a site (may retrieve 2 Force). Adds one battle destiny if with your alien or Rebel. Immune to attrition < 3 (< 5 if your Effect with ''Lando'' in lore on table).',
